briefTitle: Monitoring of Breast Cancers Treated by Neoadjuvant Therapy Via Diffusion-weighted Magnetic Resonance Imaging
officialTitle: Pilot Study: Monitoring of Breast Cancers Treated by Neoadjuvant Therapy Via Diffusion-weighted Magnetic Resonance Imaging
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Breast cancer
* Neo-adjuvant therapy indication
* Performance status from 0 to 2

Exclusion Criteria:

* Contraindications to magnetic resonance imaging (pacemaker, nerve stimulator, cochlear implant, major claustrophobia)
* Absence of histological results
* Disruption of the neo-adjuvant therapy
